description: Empire State Development manages and tracks data for the NYS Film Tax Credit Program. This dataset was provided as a companion file to the Film Credits database. The dataset displays a list of film credit productions and the location of the primary stage facility for each production.

metadata.description: Empire State Development manages and tracks data for the NYS Film Tax Credit Program. This dataset was provided as a companion file to the Film Credits database. The dataset displays a list of film credit productions and the location of the primary stage facility for each production.

name: Film Tax Credit Productions and Stage Locations: Beginning 2004
